name: Le'Var HARLEY, Petitioner v. Glynniss D. HILL, J., Respondent

parties: Le’Var HARLEY, Petitioner v. Glynniss D. HILL, J., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of October, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED. The Prothonotary is instructed to STRIKE the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
102 A.3d 417
Le’Var HARLEY, Petitioner v. Glynniss D. HILL, J., Respondent.
No. 133 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 23, 2014.
